sense.name: have in mind as a plan or purpose
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 INTEND NP2 COMP
sense.examples: She didn't intend to harm me. I really intended to write, but I didn't have time. We intend to go to Europe this summer. He didn't intend me to hear it.

sense.name: design something for a specific plan or purpose
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 INTEND NP2 COMP
sense.examples: We intend this dictionary be used for school children. They intended this be an informal event. That he is obviously intended for a grand life. This is the business in which he is intended to be employed. This is a dictionary intended for school children.

sense.name: signify or mean to express or convey
sense.examples: What do his words intend? It was intended as a compliment.
